Name: Hòa
description:
Mrs. Hoà is 44 years old and she is married. She lives in Ngoc Lac district, a mountainous area in Thanh Hoa province. Agriculture is the main business here.

She and her husband are farmers, farming rice, as well as vegetables for their family's consumption. They raise cows and chickens to sell. They also have a fruit farm, where they grow guava trees and grapefruit trees. They work hard and hope to earn enough money to build a new house in the future.

She asked for a second loan from Thanh Hoa MFI to buy fertilizer and pay wages for laborers to take care of the fruit farm. She hopes for her business to do well and sends thanks to all lenders for this loan.
